### 1.1 и 1.2
```{r, message=F}
library(tidyverse)
homo <- read.csv("http://goo.gl/Zjr9aF")
homo %>% 
  group_by(orientation) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(s.duration.ms),
            CI = 1.96*sd(s.duration.ms)/sqrt(length(s.duration.ms)))

```
